verses.verse: שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear בָ֭נִים <S%H1121><s%> ye children מ֣וּסַר <S%H4148><s%> the instruction אָ֑ב <S%H1><s%> of a father וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> and attend לָדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> to know בִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> understanding

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֶ֣קַח <S%H3948><s%> doctrine ט֭וֹב <S%H2896><s%> you good נָתַ֣תִּי <S%H5414><s%> For I give לָכֶ֑ם תּֽ֝וֹרָתִ֗י <S%H8451><s%> ye not my law אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲזֹֽבוּ׃ <S%H5800><s%> forsake

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> When בֵ֭ן <S%H1121><s%> son הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become לְאָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> For I was my father's רַ֥ךְ <S%H7390><s%> tender וְ֝יָחִ֗יד <S%H3173><s%> and only לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> [beloved] in the sight אִמִּֽי׃ <S%H517><s%> of my mother

וַיֹּרֵ֗נִי <S%H3384><s%> He taught וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> me also and said לִ֗י יִֽתְמָךְ־ <S%H8551><s%> retain דְּבָרַ֥י <S%H1697><s%> my words לִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> unto me Let thine heart שְׁמֹ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> keep מִצְוֹתַ֣י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments וֶֽחְיֵֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> and live

קְנֵ֣ה <S%H7069><s%> Get חָ֭כְמָה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom קְנֵ֣ה <S%H7069><s%> get בִינָ֑ה <S%H998><s%> understanding אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח <S%H7911><s%> forget וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תֵּ֝֗ט <S%H5186><s%> [it] not neither decline מֵֽאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> from the words פִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> of my mouth

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעַזְבֶ֥הָ <S%H5800><s%> Forsake וְתִשְׁמְרֶ֑ךָּ <S%H8104><s%> her not and she shall preserve אֱהָבֶ֥הָ <S%H157><s%> thee love וְתִצְּרֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5341><s%> her and she shall keep

רֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> [is] the principal thing חָ֭כְמָה <S%H2451><s%> Wisdom קְנֵ֣ה <S%H7069><s%> [therefore] get חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קִ֝נְיָנְךָ֗ <S%H7075><s%> and with all thy getting קְנֵ֣ה <S%H7069><s%> get בִינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> get understanding

סַלְסְלֶ֥הָ <S%H5549><s%> Exalt וּֽתְרוֹמְמֶ֑ךָּ <S%H7311><s%> her and she shall promote תְּ֝כַבֵּ֗דְךָ <S%H3513><s%> thee she shall bring thee to honour כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> if תְחַבְּקֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H2263><s%> when thou dost embrace

תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> She shall give לְ֭רֹאשְׁךָ <S%H7218><s%> to thine head לִוְיַת־ <S%H3880><s%> an ornament חֵ֑ן <S%H2580><s%> of grace עֲטֶ֖רֶת <S%H5850><s%> a crown תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת <S%H8597><s%> of glory תְּמַגְּנֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H4042><s%> shall she deliver

שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> O my son וְקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> and receive אֲמָרָ֑י <S%H561><s%> my sayings וְיִרְבּ֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> shall be many לְ֝ךָ֗ שְׁנ֣וֹת <S%H8141><s%> and the years חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of thy life

בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee in the way חָ֭כְמָה <S%H2451><s%> of wisdom הֹרֵתִ֑יךָ <S%H3384><s%> I have taught הִ֝דְרַכְתִּ֗יךָ <S%H1869><s%> I have led בְּמַעְגְּלֵי־ <S%H4570><s%> paths יֹֽשֶׁר׃ <S%H3476><s%> thee in right

בְּֽ֭לֶכְתְּךָ <S%H1980><s%> walk לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵצַ֣ר <S%H3334><s%> shall not be straitened צַעֲדֶ֑ךָ <S%H6806><s%> thy steps וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if תָּ֝ר֗וּץ <S%H7323><s%> and when thou runnest לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִכָּשֵֽׁל׃ <S%H3782><s%> thou shalt not stumble

הַחֲזֵ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> Take fast hold בַּמּוּסָ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> of instruction אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּ֑רֶף <S%H7503><s%> let [her] not go נִ֝צְּרֶ֗הָ <S%H5341><s%> keep כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> she חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> her for she [is] thy life

בְּאֹ֣רַח <S%H734><s%> not into the path רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּבֹ֑א <S%H935><s%> Enter וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּ֝אַשֵּׁ֗ר <S%H833><s%> and go בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> not in the way רָעִֽים׃ <S%H7451><s%> of evil

פְּרָעֵ֥הוּ <S%H6544><s%> Avoid אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> it pass בּ֑וֹ שְׂטֵ֖ה <S%H7847><s%> not by it turn מֵעָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> and וַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <S%H5674><s%> from it and pass away

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִֽ֭שְׁנוּ <S%H3462><s%> For they sleep אִם־ <S%H518><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יָרֵ֑עוּ <S%H7489><s%> not except they have done mischief וְֽנִגְזְלָ֥ה <S%H1497><s%> is taken away שְׁ֝נָתָ֗ם <S%H8142><s%> and their sleep אִם־ <S%H518><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot [יִכְשֹׁולוּ כ] (יַכְשִֽׁילוּ׃ <S%H3782><s%> bereave ק)

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לָ֭חֲמוּ <S%H3898><s%> For they eat לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread רֶ֑שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> of wickedness וְיֵ֖ין <S%H3196><s%> the wine חֲמָסִ֣ים <S%H2555><s%> of violence יִשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <S%H8354><s%> and drink

וְאֹ֣רַח <S%H734><s%> But the path צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> of the just כְּא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> light נֹ֑גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> [is] as the shining הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> more וָ֝א֗וֹר <S%H215><s%> that shineth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until נְכ֥וֹן <S%H3559><s%> and more unto the perfect הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> day

דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> The way רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked כָּֽאֲפֵלָ֑ה <S%H653><s%> [is] as darkness לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָ֝דְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> they know בַּמֶּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> what יִכָּשֵֽׁלוּ׃ <S%H3782><s%> not at what they stumble פ

בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son לִדְבָרַ֣י <S%H1697><s%> to my words הַקְשִׁ֑יבָה <S%H7181><s%> attend לַ֝אֲמָרַ֗י <S%H561><s%> unto my sayings הַט־ <S%H5186><s%> incline אָזְנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H241><s%> thine ear

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יַלִּ֥יזוּ <S%H3868><s%> Let them not depart מֵעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> from thine eyes שָׁ֝מְרֵ֗ם <S%H8104><s%> keep בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> them in the midst לְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3824><s%> of thine heart

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For חַיִּ֣ים <S%H2416><s%> For they [are] life הֵ֭ם <S%H1992><s%> who לְמֹצְאֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4672><s%> unto those that find וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all בְּשָׂר֥וֹ <S%H1320><s%> to all their flesh מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <S%H4832><s%> them and health

מִֽכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִ֭שְׁמָר <S%H4929><s%> with all diligence נְצֹ֣ר <S%H5341><s%> Keep לִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> thy heart כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> from תּוֹצְא֥וֹת <S%H8444><s%> for out of it [are] the issues חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of life

הָסֵ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> Put away מִ֭מְּךָ <S%H4480><s%> at עִקְּשׁ֣וּת <S%H6143><s%> from thee a froward פֶּ֑ה <S%H6310><s%> mouth וּלְז֥וּת <S%H3891><s%> and perverse שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <S%H8193><s%> lips הַרְחֵ֥ק <S%H7368><s%> put far מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at

עֵ֭ינֶיךָ <S%H5869><s%> Let thine eyes לְנֹ֣כַח <S%H5227><s%> right on יַבִּ֑יטוּ <S%H5027><s%> look וְ֝עַפְעַפֶּ֗יךָ <S%H6079><s%> and let thine eyelids יַיְשִׁ֥רוּ <S%H3474><s%> look straight נֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5048><s%> front

פַּ֭לֵּס <S%H6424><s%> Ponder מַעְגַּ֣ל <S%H4570><s%> the path רַגְלֶ֑ךָ <S%H7272><s%> of thy feet וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all דְּרָכֶ֥יךָ <S%H1870><s%> and let all thy ways יִכֹּֽנוּ׃ <S%H3559><s%> be established אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תֵּט־ <S%H5186><s%> afternoon
יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> not to the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <S%H8040><s%> nor to the left הָסֵ֖ר <S%H5493><s%> remove רַגְלְךָ֣ <S%H7272><s%> thy foot מֵרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> from evil
